name: Pixel_Stomper()
description:
Premise():

In Pixel_Stomper(),  mysterious pixel art paintings float in the sky and you have to pound them. Every single pixel has to be stamped without stompy falling down from the small squares . 

Features():

- the hero: Stompy        uwu

- a world map

- 13 unique Levels

- stones with mustaches 

- lots of pixels to be stomped

Dev_Stuff():

I dont't know if the mac build works because I didn't try it out,-sorry 

Feedback is appreciated , it was a lot of fun to work on this project and I would love to keep working on the game and maybe add a second world and a lot of new cool mechanics. 

and also thanks for checking out the game : )
